page.title: 04Folksworth Church
page.content: FOLKSWORTH CHURCH. Folksworth Church has a patron saint called St.Helen.Folksworth Church was built in 1150. It was built of Barnack Stone.The Bishop of Ely used to give sermons at Folksworth Church but now we've got a new reverend, Mr.Longfoot. Folksworth Church has only got a south transcept and that was added to the church in 1300.The church has a bell like most churches.St.Helen was born in Asia Minor in 2055 A.D. and died in 330A.D.There are also stain glass windows which tell the story of Jesus.In the church there is a font and a pulpit which are not used very often.The roof was falling to pieces and the people in the village raised money to mend it.
